title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description:
Description: When the localization key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Enter steps to reproduce here]
OB: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart when the localization key is blank.
EB:
In the properties file, the key is left blank, although it should have a valid value.

Expected result: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart's title.

Actual result: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
